tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vehicle_maintenance_records (
  vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_make VARCHAR(50),
  vehicle_model VARCHAR(50),
  last_service_date DATE,
  service_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ServiceHistory (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    service_date DATE,
    service_cost DECIMAL(10,2),
    mechanic_name VARCHAR(255)
    FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES VehicleMaintenance(vehicle_id)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_history ( maintenance_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id INT,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
  maintenance_date DATE,
  mechanic VARCHAR(50),
  cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
  FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES vehicle(vehicle_id)
);

CREATE TABLE parts_used ( parts_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  maintenance_id INT,
  part_name VARCHAR(50),
  part_cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
  quantity INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (maintenance_id) REFERENCES maintenance_history(maintenance_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Vehicle (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    make VARCHAR(50),
    model VARCHAR(50),
    year INT,
    vin VARCHAR(17)
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceEvent (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    service_date DATE,
    service_description TEXT,
    cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES Vehicle(vehicle_id)
);

CREATE TABLE EventAssignment (
    event_id INT,
    mechanic_id INT,
    assigned_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES MaintenanceEvent(event_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (mechanic_id) REFERENCES Mechanic(mechanic_id)
);

CREATE TABLE vehicles (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    make VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    model VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    year INTEGER NOT NULL,
    vin VARCHAR(17) UNIQUE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_records (
    record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INTEGER REFERENCES vehicles(id),
    service_date DATE NOT NULL,
    service_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    service_details TEXT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE mechanic_records (
    record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    mechanic_id INTEGER REFERENCES mechanics(mechanic_id),
    service_date DATE NOT NULL,
    service_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    service_details TEXT NOT NULL
);
